items.name: profile-card
items.title: Profile Card
items.description: An extension of the avatar component with more details on the individual. Good for blog posts etc.

items.name: chip
items.title: Chip
items.description: A component that combines small text with an icon for quick callouts. This component highlights key values such as benefits, attributes, or job details.

items.name: sub-feature
items.title: Sub Feature
items.description: A component that presents a smaller feature layout for a dialled-back look. This component balances detail with simplicity.

items.name: featured-icon
items.title: Featured Icon
items.description: A component that places an icon inside a styled square or circle frame for extra prominence. This component makes supporting visuals stand out in marketing layouts.

items.name: ui-showcase
items.title: UI Showcase
items.description: A Placeholder that displays content in a device-style frame. This component helps showcase product UI.

items.name: job-listing
items.title: Job Listing
items.description: A component that displays open roles in a card format with a badge, title, short body, and feature chips. This component brings structure and clarity to careers pages.

items.name: star-rating
items.title: Star Rating
items.description: A component that displays ratings with stars and an optional label. This component builds trust with visual feedback.

items.name: pricing-card
items.title: Pricing Card
items.description: A component for Figma that compares plans with layout variants, including a “Most Popular” highlight. This component makes pricing clear and actionable.

items.name: blog-image
items.title: Blog Image
items.description: A component that displays an inline or full-width image with an optional caption. This component makes blog articles more engaging and visually appealing.

items.name: metric
items.title: Metric
items.description: A component that displays large stats with a sub-label for context. This component is designed to highlight performance or usage data.

items.name: feature-stack
items.title: Feature Stack
items.description: A component that arranges an icon, header, body text, and CTA in different layout styles. This component makes features clear and actionable.

items.name: heading
items.title: Heading
items.description: A component that displays a heading.
